channel.title: Comments on: What makes a successful SQL Server Pro?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jack Vamvas
item.dc:creator: Jack Vamvas
item.description: One good habit to develop is to try and use SQLCMD , for as many tasks as possible. It takes you out of the SSMS mindset
item.content:encoded: One good habit to develop is to try and use SQLCMD , for as many tasks as possible. It takes you out of the SSMS mindset

item.title: By: remou
item.dc:creator: remou
item.description: I really wish people would understand that "would impact database performance and system availability" is not a good answer, as you have shown.
item.content:encoded: I really wish people would understand that “would impact database performance and system availability” is not a good answer, as you have shown.
